keyMappings:
# Workaround for Gmail using `d` and `u` for its own mappings;
# this may conflict with `CTRL+d` and `CTRL+u` on Linux/Windows, however, the
# former is a shortcut for adding a bookmark, which I don't use anyway, while
# I'm not sure the CTRL-u if even has any mapping
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
